column.description: procedure used to compute the current value

column.name: METRIC_AGGREGATE_OPERATOR_2
column.description: operator used to compute the current value. 0: none, 1: COUNT, 2: SUM, 3: AVG, 4: MIN, 5: MAX, 11: COUNT DISTINCT, ...

column.name: METRIC_VALUE_TYPE
column.description: type of the value. 0: numeric, 1: numeric percentage, 2: character, 3: object, 4: character date, 5: numeric as integer, 6: no value
